name: Escape the room
description:
What kind of game?

This is a pixel leisure game for puzzle solving and room escape lovers.
Players can operate by mouse click or keyboard.
The whole game needs to find clues and crack puzzle to escape the secret room.

There are many types of secret rooms, such as Theme Secret Rooms, including Halloween Secret Rooms and Christmas Secret Rooms.
Puzzle solving methods mainly include switches, passwords, mathematics, color mixing and small games.
Careful observation will also get plot clues. The complete plot stories are also hidden in different maps, which requires players to feel and guess.

The game has certain difficulty, and even combines mathematics and color fusion to test certain observation and memory.

This is my first game. I hope you can support me. In the future, I will try to make more interesting games to share with you!

What if you encounter difficulties in the game and can't find clues to pass the customs?

You can go to my YouTube home page to view the level tutorial

If you don't like this game, what should you do?

You can express your valuable opinions in the steam comment area and submit a refund application to the steam customer service.

Pengfei Qiu's works, thank you for your support.
